#Part 1: Fun with functions
##Part 1A: Exponential transformation
```{r 1a, echo=TRUE}
Exp <- function(x, k) {
  sum <- 1
  while (k>=1){
    a <- x^(k)/factorial(k)
    k <- k-1
    sum <- sum + a
  }
  print(sum)
  }
```

```{r 1b, echo=TRUE}
sample_mean <- function(x) {
    sum <- 0
    for (i in seq_along(x)) {
      sum <- sum + x[i]
    }
    mean <- sum/i
    print(mean)
}

sample_sd <- function(x) {
   summ <- 0
  for (i in seq_along(x)) {
      summ <- summ + x[i]
    }
    mean <- summ/i
    
sumsd <- 0
    for (i in seq_along(x)) {
      sumsd <- sumsd + (x[i] - mean)^2
    }
    sd <- sqrt(sumsd/i)
    print(sd)
}
